title: How Do I Know My Chargebacks Won't Skyrocket With FlexPay?
summary: This article explains how FlexPay's invisible recovery solution does not increase chargebacks. It details how recovered customers have the same chargeback rate as if their initial payment was approved, and how recovering existing customers is more beneficial than acquiring new ones.
key_points: FlexPay's invisible recovery does not increase chargebacks.
Recovered customers have the same chargeback rate as approved initial payments.
Recovering existing customers is more valuable than acquiring new ones.
The solution is designed to minimize false declines and retain customers.
